name: Gachi Dungeon Master
description:
Real "Dungeon Master" is back in a furious fighting game!

Take on the role of one of the five legendary hachimuchi icons and enter the arena. Each character is distinguished by their own grips and strikes. Someone falls with his ass right on the face of the opponent, and someone gracefully wringes the opponent's hands.

The game features several game modes, each of which supports up to 4 players. You can even play online using "Steam Remote Play". At the same time, your friend does not need to have a copy of the game.

Versus - in this mode you can customize all the game parameters you need. Emerging bonuses, stamina, etc.

Real Gachi - Fight alone or with friends against a strong and resilient boss!

Boss of the Gym - is a cooperative survival game. Opponents will appear on the map, and each time they will be stronger and stronger. How long can you hold out?

Game features:
5 unique characters with their own unique moves;
3 game modes, there are both cooperative and competitive;
4 different locations, many of which will be familiar to you;
Possibility of local play for up to 4 players or online using Steam Remote Play;
Signature gachi sound;
